subject: (elisa)
body:
I'm thankful for this commuting of mine today, two hours and a half for a meeting in Amsterdam: I don't do it often, but today feels like a treat, because I can read the book I never have the time for the whole train ride. I'm thankful I have the luxury to think of it like this and that I need to do work on the way back only.

\- elisa (10/9/17).

[what are you thankful for?](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1X6z1T5sSBXxFpfGI7gPZzQIp_qgkDCsVVCLV4yrw1a4/edit)
